SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into question (bad_num, comment_id, content, course_id, good_num, is_cream, is_resource, `level`, level_desc, person_id, person_name, question_desc, techer_id, techer_name, `time`, title, visit_num) values (#{badNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isCream,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isResource,jdbcType=BIT}, #{level,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{levelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{techerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitNum,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update question set bad_num = #{badNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, good_num = #{goodNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_cream = #{isCream,jdbcType=BIT}, is_resource = #{isResource,jdbcType=BIT}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level_desc = #{levelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question_desc = #{questionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, techer_id = #{techerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, techer_name = #{techerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visit_num = #{visitNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select question_id, bad_num, comment_id, content, course_id, good_num, is_cream, is_resource, `level`, level_desc, person_id, person_name, question_desc, techer_id, techer_name, `time`, title, visit_num from question where question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select question_id, bad_num, comment_id, content, course_id, good_num, is_cream, is_resource, `level`, level_desc, person_id, person_name, question_desc, techer_id, techer_name, `time`, title, visit_num from question
